texto: 7 Quality model for quality in use This clause defines the quality model for quality in use. The attributes of quality in use are categorised into four characteristics: effectiveness, productivity, safety and satisfaction (Figure 5). quality in use effectiveness productivity safety satisfaction Figure 5 - Quality model for quality in use Quality in use is the userâ€™s view of quality. Achieving quality in use is dependent on achieving the necessary external quality, which in turn is dependent on achieving the necessary internal quality (Figure 2).
